column5: NEW YORK  Aug 18 U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday  with the S&P 500 trading in its tightest daily range in nearly a month  weighed down by earnings-related selling in Wal-Mart and a drop in materials stocks on concerns about China's economic health.

column5: Wal-Mart Stores Inc  reported weaker quarterly earnings and lowered its annual forecast on Tuesday  as it copes with higher labor costs  a squeeze on pharmacy margins and sliding sales at its British supermarket chain. | Video

column4: UPDATE 4-Wal-Mart profit misses estimates; cuts outlook as pharmacy margins bite
column5: Aug 18 Wal-Mart Stores Inc reported weaker quarterly earnings and lowered its annual forecast on Tuesday  as it copes with higher labor costs  a squeeze on pharmacy margins and sliding sales at its British supermarket chain.

column4: GLOBAL MARKETS-Wall St  Europe slip after Chinese selloff
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 18 A 6 percent tumble in Chinese shares on Tuesday and disappointing earnings from Wal-Mart dented U.S. equities while copper and oil prices touched multi-year lows.

column4: US STOCKS-U.S. stocks fall as Wal-Mart  energy stocks weigh
column5: * Indexes down: Dow 0.23 pct  S&P 0.29 pct  Nasdaq 0.50 pct   (Updates to early afternoon)

column4: Wells Fargo adding car loan branches to boost less risky lending
column5: Wells Fargo  is building more branches devoted to car loans and financing for auto dealers in an effort to increase its auto lending business without taking bad credit risk  the bank's head of car lending told Reuters.

column4: UPDATE 1-Wells Fargo adding car loan branches to boost less risky lending
column5: Aug 18 Wells Fargo is building more branches devoted to car loans and financing for auto dealers in an effort to increase its auto lending business without taking bad credit risk  the bank's head of car lending told Reuters.

column4: Wells Fargo adding car loan branches to boost less risky lending
column5: Aug 18 Wells Fargo is building more branches devoted to car loans and financing for auto dealers in an effort to increase its auto lending business without taking bad credit risk  the bank's head of car lending told Reuters.

column4: MOVES-Wells Fargo Capital Fin names head of supply chain finance in Europe
column5: Aug 18 Wells Fargo Capital Finance  a unit of Wells Fargo & Co  appointed Nick Lawrence as managing director for Supply Chain Finance (SCF) in Europe.

column4: Argentina's YPF to pay $122 mln for stakes in petrochemical firms
column5: BUENOS AIRES  Aug 18 Argentina's state-run energy firm YPF will pay about $122 million for stakes in two locally based petrochemical companies as part of its growth strategy to add value to locally produced crude oil  the company said on Tuesday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Yum China gets new leadership as activists push for spinoff
column5: Aug 18 Yum Brands Inc announced on Tuesday new leadership for its China division as investor activists lobby for the owner of the KFC and Pizza Hut brands to spin off that business  which is its biggest driver of revenue and profit.

column4: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Yum China gets new leadership amid activist push for spin off
column5: Aug 18 Yum Brands Inc on Tuesday announced new leadership for its China business as investor activists lobby for the owner of the KFC and Pizza Hut brands to spin off that business  which is its biggest driver of revenue and profit.

column4: Yum Brands appoints Micky Pant as CEO of China division
column5: Aug 18 Yum Brands Inc  the owner of the Pizza Hut and KFC restaurant chains  said company veteran Micky Pant would replace Sam Su as chief executive of its China division.
